data.name: Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster - Shin Megami Tensei BGM Pack
data.detailed_description:
Includes BGM tracks from various games in the "Shin Megami Tensei" series to use on the map and during battle in the Vortex World. Change anytime from the Config menu.
*Available after reaching the Vortex World.
data.about_the_game:
Includes BGM tracks from various games in the "Shin Megami Tensei" series to use on the map and during battle in the Vortex World. Change anytime from the Config menu.
*Available after reaching the Vortex World.
data.short_description: Includes BGM tracks from various games in the "Shin Megami Tensei" series to use on the map and during battle in the Vortex World.

fullgame.name: Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 545
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLC Disk Space: 143.6 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD Phenom II X2 560
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLC Disk Space: 143.6 MB

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of violence, including killing, are depicted, though the use of blood and gore is minimal. Some character designs are provocative. Dialogue uses expletives from time to time.
